actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service.

committees.committee: House Post Office and Civil Service

official_title: A bill to provide that pay adjustments for Members of Congress take effect in the Congress next following the Congress in which they are approved.

summary.text: Provides, under the Federal Salary Act of 1967, that pay adjustments for Members of Congress take effect in the Congress take effect in the Congress next following the Congress in which they are approved.

titles.title: A bill to provide that pay adjustments for Members of Congress take effect in the Congress next following the Congress in which they are approved.
